text: The Little Doe River is a river located in Carter County, Tennessee. It forms from the confluence of Simerly Creek and Tiger Creek near the community of Tiger Valley, and runs in a northerly direction alongside U.S. Route 19E until its termination into Doe River just south of the town of Hampton, Tennessee. ==See also== *List of rivers of Tennessee ==References== * * Category:Rivers of Tennessee Category:Rivers of Carter County, Tennessee Category:Hampton, Tennessee
title: Little Doe River
